…really carries out our Nation's foreign  policy in a historic way in so many different aspects. …by line and in the open.

This package cuts nearly $9 billion compared to last year. Financial  Services is flat-funded. National Security and State are cut by a  whopping 16 percent. It is proof that we can fund priorities without  growing our government.
